trans-unit.source: Managing dependencies in .NET Core Preview 3 tooling
trans-unit.target: 管理 .NET Core 预览版 3 工具的依赖项

trans-unit.source: Preview 3 brings about changes to how dependencies are managed
trans-unit.target: 预览版 3 改变了依赖关系的管理方式

trans-unit.source: CLI, extensibility, custom commands, .NET Core
trans-unit.target: CLI, 扩展性, 自定义命令, .NET Core

trans-unit.source: Managing dependencies in .NET Core Preview 3 tooling
trans-unit.target: 管理 .NET Core 预览版 3 工具的依赖项

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概述

trans-unit.source: With the move of .NET Core projects from project.json to csproj and MSBuild, a significant invesment also happened that resulted in unification of the project file and assets that allow tracking of depenencies.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Core 项目从 project.json 移动到 csproj 和 MSBuild 的同时，还投入了大笔资金将项目文件和资产统一，以便跟踪依赖项。

trans-unit.source: For .NET Core projects this is similar to what project.json did.
trans-unit.target: 对于 .NET Core 项目，这与 project.json 的做法类似。

trans-unit.source: There is no separate JSON or XML file that tracks NuGet dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 没有单独的 JSON 或 XML 文件来跟踪 NuGet 依赖项。

trans-unit.source: With this change, we've also introduced another type of *reference* into the csproj syntax called the `<PackageReference>`.
trans-unit.target: 通过这种改变，我们还在名为 `<PackageReference>` 的 csproj 语法中引入了另一种类型的引用。

trans-unit.source: This document describes the new reference type.
trans-unit.target: 本文档介绍了新的引用类型。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to add a package dependency using this new reference type to your project.
trans-unit.target: 它还演示了如何使用此新引用类型将包依赖项添加到项目。

trans-unit.source: The new <PackageReference> element
trans-unit.target: 新的 <PackageReference> 元素

trans-unit.source: The `<PackageReference>` has the following basic structure:
trans-unit.target: `<PackageReference>` 具有下列基本结构：

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with MSBuild, it will look familiar to the other [reference types]() that already exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果你熟悉 MSBuild，则它看起来和已有的[引用类型]()很相似。

trans-unit.source: The key is the `Include` statement which specifies the package id that you wish to add to the project.
trans-unit.target: 关键是 `Include` 语句，它指定要添加到项目的包 ID。

trans-unit.source: The `<Version>` child element specified the version to get.
trans-unit.target: `<Version>` 子元素指定了要获取的版本。

trans-unit.source: The versions are specified as per [NuGet version rules](https://docs.nuget.org/ndocs/create-packages/dependency-versions#version-ranges).
trans-unit.target: 根据 [NuGet 版本规则](https://docs.nuget.org/ndocs/create-packages/dependency-versions#version-ranges)指定版本。

trans-unit.source: **Note:** if you are not faimilar with the overall `csproj` syntax, you can use the [MSBuild project reference documentation]() to get acquainted.
trans-unit.target: **注意：**如果不熟悉整体 `csproj` 语法，可以使用 [MSBuild 项目参考文档]()来熟悉。

trans-unit.source: Adding a dependency that is available only in a specific target is done using conditions:
trans-unit.target: 使用以下条件添加仅在特定目标中可用的依赖项：

trans-unit.source: The above means that the dependency will only be valid if the build is happening for that given target.
trans-unit.target: 上面的意思是，依赖项只有在对给定目标生成时才有效。

trans-unit.source: The `$(TargetFramework)` in the condition is a MSBuild property that is being set in the project.
trans-unit.target: 条件中的 `$(TargetFramework)` 是将在项目中设置的 MSBuild 属性。

trans-unit.source: For most common .NET Core applications, you will not need to do this.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数常见的 .NET Core 应用程序，无需这样做。

trans-unit.source: Adding a dependency to your project
trans-unit.target: 向项目添加依赖项

trans-unit.source: Adding a dependency to your project is straightforward.
trans-unit.target: 向项目添加依赖项非常简单。

trans-unit.source: Here is an example of how to add `JSON.net` version `9.0.1` to your project.
trans-unit.target: 下面是如何向项目添加 `JSON.net` 版本 `9.0.1` 的示例。

trans-unit.source: Of course, it is applicable to any other NuGet dependency.
trans-unit.target: 当然，它也适用于其他任意 NuGet 依赖项。

trans-unit.source: When you open your project file, you will see two or more `<ItemGroup>` nodes.
trans-unit.target: 打开项目文件时，将看到两个或多个 `<ItemGroup>` 节点。

trans-unit.source: You will notice that one of the nodes already has `<PackageReference>` elements in it.
trans-unit.target: 你会注意到其中一个节点已有 `<PackageReference>` 元素。

trans-unit.source: You can add your new dependency to this node, or create a new one; it is completely up to you as the result will be the same.
trans-unit.target: 可以向此节点添加新的依赖项，或创建一个新的依赖项；这完全取决于你，因为其结果将是一样的。

trans-unit.source: In this example we will use the default template that is dropped by `dotnet new`.
trans-unit.target: 在本示例中，将使用被 `dotnet new` 删除的默认模板。

trans-unit.source: This is a simple console application.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个简单的控制台应用程序。

trans-unit.source: When we open up the project, we first find the `<ItemGroup>` with already existing `<PackageReference>` in it.
trans-unit.target: 打开项目时，首先找到 `<ItemGroup>`，其中包含已存在的 `<PackageReference>`。

trans-unit.source: We then add the following to it:
trans-unit.target: 然后将下列内容添加进去：

trans-unit.source: After this, we save the project and run the `dotnet restore` command to install the dependency.
trans-unit.target: 之后，保存项目并运行 `dotnet restore` 命令以安装依赖项。

trans-unit.source: The full project looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 完整项目如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Removing a dependency from the project
trans-unit.target: 从项目中删除依赖项

trans-unit.source: Removing a dependency from the project file involves simply removing the `<PackageReference>` from the project file.
trans-unit.target: 从项目文件中删除依赖项仅包含从项目文件中删除 `<PackageReference>`。
